author: rekovic
body:
pr921 for PhaseII L1T MC processing.

Define step HGCalTriggerPrimitives to be used by cmsDriver command for PhaseII L1T MC reprocessing.

Reason:  
Since PhaseII MC samples were made, there was an important development in 
HGCalTriggerPrimitives available in CMSSW_9_2_1.
To be able to reprocess the samples centrally and run only the new HGCalTPs, need to define
it as a step to be used by `cmsDriver.py`
title: pr921 Define cmsDriver step HGCalTriggerPrimitives
